Competency Question / Fact: A tracking tag has an identifier
A tracking tag signals its location (and that of the resource it is assigned to)
A tracking tag signals its location at a particular time
There are three kinds of location a tracking tag can signal: location locationKF and locationMA
A tracking tag belongs to a tag group
A tag group has an identifier and a name
A tag group will be assigned to workders or to equipment
a tracking tag is assigned to a tracked zone, which is a sub-class of spatial zones in the facility ontology
